description:
A true all-rounder, the highly breathable Wanderwall Pants deliver comfort for exploring the local crag or browsing through artisan markets. Gathered cuffs and a mid-rise smocked waist look as good with a tank top and flip flops as they do with a hydration pack and day hikers. The stretchy fabric lets you move with ease through every twist and turn of your adventure. In the newest edition, the waistband offers increased stretch, and the lower leg is more tapered for a cleaner look.

  • Made of abrasion resistant ripstop nylon and spandex, with recycled content
  • Durable water repellent (DWR) finish provides weather protection against unexpected showers
  • Pull-on, drawcord-style elastic waist with faux fly
  • 2 deep front pockets for essentials
  • Double-layer of fabric at knees for extra durability for climbing or kneeling in a canoe
  • Gusseted crotch gives you range of motion to reach for footholds, sink deep into yoga poses or bound over fallen logs
  • Tapered fit with a trim cuff at the ankle
  • Inseam length: short 27.5 in. regular 29.5 in. long 31.5 in
name: MEC Wanderwall Pants - Women's
